description:
The Frame Arm Girls decide to play hide and seek until Ao gets home. Afterwards, Gourai wants an upgrade, and Bukiko is more than willing to help!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: VS Hresvelgr / FA Girl Hajimete Monogatari
VSフレズヴェルク / FAガールはじめて物語
Vs. Hresvelgr / First Tale of the F.A. Girls
